defs: the expertise, expert skill or knowledge of medicinal herbs.
the root of a plant.
any small plant used for medicinal purposes; a herb.

a herb supposed to have the magical power of changing base metals into gold.
a man who sells herbs or herbal products that have medicinal use.
a man who promotes; a man who begins, helps to organise a business, industry, philosophy, movement, social system, etc.; a promoter.

the extent of raise or descent between two straight lines, at the point of their intersection or joint on the same plane, measured either clockwise or anticlockwise, expressed in terms of degrees.

ಮೆಟ್ಟಲು ಹತ್ತು meṭṭalu hattu = ಮೆಟ್ಟಲು ತುಳಿ; ಮೆಟ್ಟಲು ತುಳಿ meṭṭalu tuḷi to enter into a building; 2. (fig.) to enter into a school for studying.
(an animal) to have sexual intercourse.
a standing on the toes, lifting up the heels.
= ಮೆಟ್ಟಲು.
to cause to tread or walk on.
to cause to dance.
to make another wear footwear.
to walk on foot.
to place the foot on; to step on.
to wear foot-coverings as shoes, boots, slippers, etc.
to set in something into; to inlay.
to implant a plant as in transplanting.
(animals) to have sexual intercouse.
to press hard on the floor or an hard object.
(an evil spirit) to possess (a person).
to be written.
to put the steps rhythmically (in dancing).
to charm; to fascinate; to bring (another) under spell.
to destroy, ruin completely.

ಮೆಟ್ಟಿಕೊಳ್ಳು meṭṭikoḷḷu (an evil spirit) to take a person under control; to possess; ಮೆಟ್ಟಿನಿಲ್ಲು meṭṭi nillu to overcome; to stand above others (in merit); ಮೆಟ್ಟಿ ಬೀಳು meṭṭi bīḷu to feel amazement; to wonder; to be wonder-stuck; ಮೆಟ್ಟಿಕ್ಕು meṭṭikku to ruin, eradicate completely.
the act of treading, stepping or walking on.
any of various foot coverings, as shoes, boots, slippers, etc.
the length of one's foot (as a unit of linear measure).
the manner or mode of placing steps rhythmically in dancing.
a flight of steps.
a place or region.
the trodden path; a way.
an ornamental (silver) ring worn by women on their toe.
a piece of furniture having three or four legs, without back or arms, usu.to stand on while winnowing grain on the thresh-floor.
the fret of a vīṇe, a stringed musical instrument.
(dance.) a particular kind of rythmic and measured movement of hands, legs, and head.
a metal blade fixed vertically to a wooden plant or metal plate, to sit on and cut vegetables.
= ಮೆಟ್ಟುಗಲ್ಲು.
the entire structure of a flight of steps made of stone slabs.
= ಮೆಟ್ಟುಕತ್ತಿ.
a flight of steps made of stone slabs.
ಮೆಟ್ಟುಗಲ್ಲು ಚಿನ್ನವಾದರೆ ನಿನಗೆ ಅರೆವಾಸಿ, ನನಗೆ ಅರೆವಾಸಿ meṭṭugallu cinnavādare, ninage arevāsi, nanage arevāsi (prov.) if wishes were horses, beggars would ride.
a simple shed, tent for temporary lodging.
to construct a flight of stairs.
= ಮೆಟ್ಟುಗೆಗೆಯ್.
a kind of plant.
= ಮೆಟರೆ.
